医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
ATCC 宣布获得国家过敏和传染病研究所的奖项，以支持其生物制药产品开发的临床前服务ATCC 今天宣布，它已获得一份无限期交付/无限数量 (IDIQ) 合同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/ATCC-announces-award-from-national-institute-of-allergy-and-infectious-diseases-to-support-its-preclinical-services-for-生物制药产品开发.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/ATCC-announces-award-from-national-institute-of-allergy-and-infectious-diseases-to-support-its-preclinical-services-for-生物制药产品开发.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2bb9dea8-5e98-46bf-be8e-c5995a3ad9ee Mon, 13 Nov 2023 10:10:00 -0500 ATCC announces award from national institute of allergy and infectious diseases to support its preclinical services for biopharmaceutical product development
NanoSyrinx 任命 Anthony Johnson 为非执行董事大型制药公司高管的任命将加强领导团队，以推动雄心勃勃的增长战略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/NanoSyrinx-appoints-Anthony-Johnson-as-Non-Executive-Director.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/NanoSyrinx-appoints-Anthony-Johnson-as-Non-Executive-Director.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a77b541-b099-4bee-935d-5ba64e599552 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 10:02:00 -0500 NanoSyrinx appoints Anthony Johnson as Non-Executive Director
BioEcho 推出 EchoLUTION™ FFPE RNA 试剂盒，可从 FFPE 组织中提取优质 RNA创新分子生物学解决方案的领先供应商宣布推出 EchoLUTION FFPE RNA 试剂盒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/BioEcho-introduces-EchoLUTIONe284a2-FFPE-RNA-Kit-for-superior-RNA-extraction-from-FFPE-tissues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/BioEcho-introduces-EchoLUTIONe284a2-FFPE-RNA-Kit-for-superior-RNA-extraction-from-FFPE-tissues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d81cddf-50db-46c1-8f7d-71d6d7f1a61e Mon, 13 Nov 2023 09:26:00 -0500 BioEcho introduces EchoLUTION™ FFPE RNA Kit for superior RNA extraction from FFPE tissues
Porvair Sciences 推出 UltraPPM LITE 以实现可靠的样品处理Porvair Sciences 自豪地宣布推出 UltraPPM LITE 正压歧管。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Porvair-Sciences-Introduces-UltraPPM-LITE-for-Reliable-Sample-Processing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Porvair-Sciences-Introduces-UltraPPM-LITE-for-Reliable-Sample-Processing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b5fa1df-f584-4d77-9035-f3bc62ec7bc3 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 08:53:00 -0500 Porvair Sciences Introduces UltraPPM LITE for Reliable Sample Processing
利用人工智能和机器学习改变大脑研究通过机器学习，研究人员能够利用来自大脑的数据来收集更深入的见解，并将这些新知识应用于临床环境。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Transforming-brain-research-with-AI-and-machine-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Transforming-brain-research-with-AI-and-machine-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24235cc1-92fa-4077-9ff6-79fee2fc75d3 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 08:09:03 -0500 Transforming brain research with AI and machine learning
探索使用致幻剂作为精神疾病的新疗法迷幻化合物，如裸盖菇素（一种在多种蘑菇中发现的物质）作为精神疾病的新疗法正在获得更多的研究支持，但关于它们对谁最有帮助的问题仍然存在。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Exploring-the-use-of-psychedelics-as-novel-treatments-for-psychiatric-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Exploring-the-use-of-psychedelics-as-novel-treatments-for-psychiatric-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74f633c1-c3fb-4649-8bd8-88eb464e7bfe Mon, 13 Nov 2023 08:03:31 -0500 Exploring the use of psychedelics as novel treatments for psychiatric disorders
德克萨斯州和佛罗里达州的立法者如何破坏新冠疫苗接种工作凯瑟琳·威尔斯 (Katherine Wells) 希望敦促她位于德克萨斯州拉伯克的社区接种 covid-19 疫苗。 “这确实可以使人们免于患上严重疾病，”该市公共卫生主任威尔斯说。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/How-lawmakers-in-Texas-and-Florida-undermine-covid-vaccination-efforts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/How-lawmakers-in-Texas-and-Florida-undermine-covid-vaccination-efforts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b382a80-6871-4ac6-bb86-a844ed057141 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 06:26:56 -0500 How lawmakers in Texas and Florida undermine covid vaccination efforts
开创性研究发现肺腺癌的预测生物标志物肿瘤邻近正常肺组织的转录组在预测肺癌预后中的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Pioneering-study-finds-predictive-biomarker-in-lung-adenocarcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Pioneering-study-finds-predictive-biomarker-in-lung-adenocarcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5eec2bf4-7d94-41c7-8a58-88f84a14bdde Mon, 13 Nov 2023 06:23:00 -0500 Pioneering study finds predictive biomarker in lung adenocarcinoma
理解和检测阿尔茨海默病的进展研究人员正在努力了解和检测阿尔茨海默病的早期阶段，此时干预措施可能最有效地减缓疾病的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Advances-in-understanding-and-detecting-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Advances-in-understanding-and-detecting-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1813572e-781b-4a61-be77-b7db1aea3775 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 06:22:45 -0500 Advances in understanding and detecting Alzheimer's disease
慢性压力和情绪障碍如何影响青少年大脑发育先进的大脑成像技术揭示了青少年大脑发育如何影响慢性压力和情绪障碍等因素，以及如何受到这些因素的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/How-chronic-stress-and-mood-disorders-affect-adolescent-brain-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/How-chronic-stress-and-mood-disorders-affect-adolescent-brain-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6914769f-ae12-44f5-9f3c-906fc75f954e Mon, 13 Nov 2023 06:12:08 -0500 How chronic stress and mood disorders affect adolescent brain development
